===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[catty]], a unit of [[weight]]
## {{lb|zh|Mainland}} [[catty]] or ''jin'', a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.5 [[kilogram]]s
## {{lb|zh|Hong Kong}} [[catty]] or [[kan]], a traditional unit of weight, legally defined as equal to 0.60478982 [[kilogram]]s ({{zh-l|*公斤}} or sometimes approximated as 500 grams)
## {{lb|zh|Taiwan}} [[catty]], a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.6&nbsp;[[kilogram]]s, also equal to 16&nbsp;[[tael]]s
# [[axe]]; [[ax]]
# [[keen]]; [[shrewd]]
